short_text: Introducing Mac n’ Cheetos, the cheesy snack that combines two cheese-tastic favorites in one fun and filling snack.
full_text: Crunchy Mac n’ Cheetos are elbow shaped puffs stuffed with a real cheese filling, and coated in delicious flavors such as Original Cheetos and Flamin’ Hot. They are a playful and satiating snack made for munching on your own or sharing with fellow cheese lovers.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Potato Nests, beautiful real-potato cracker nests that create a simply sophisticated snacking experience.
full_text: Lay’s Potato Nests are thin and crispy two-bite crackers made from real potato shreds, baked to a golden brown, and lightly seasoned with grown-up flavors. Delicious on their own or when topped with your favorite cheeses and spreads, they’re the perfect snack for you and your guests. Available in delicious flavors like Sea Salt & Pepper, Garlic & Rosemary, and Parmesan & Herb.

short_text: Introducing Tostitos Toppers, the satisfying chip with a real-cheese taste that everyone will love.
full_text: Each Tostitos Topper is a bite-sized white corn tortilla chip with REAL shredded cheese baked right on top, with varieties like Cheddar, Cheddar Jalapeño or Pepper Jack. Crispy baked and then lightly seasoned, they’re perfect just as they are or ready for any dip.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Duos, the classic Cheetos you love made even more fun and flavorful by combining two delicious taste experiences in one.
full_text: Cheetos Duos are Cheetos puffs with two layers of flavor paired perfectly to double the fun. With flavors such as Flamin’ Hot & Ranch or Original Cheetos & Salsa, they are the slightly outrageous snack that will keep you coming back for more.

short_text: Introducing Matador Thin Sliced Jerky Chips, a salty and crispy meat snack that delivers big protein to fill you up and even bigger flavor to satisfy your cravings.
full_text: Cut extra-thin and baked to crispy perfection, each bag of Matador Thin Sliced Jerky Chips is made with smoky, all-natural cured meats like pepperoni, salami, or bacon. Perfect for a tasty snack that gives you all the filling protein you need, without the stuck-in-your-teeth chewiness of jerky.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Reduced Fat Poppables, the light and crispy way to snack throughout your day.
full_text: Lay’s Reduced Fat Poppables are light, airy and perfectly air-popped bites with 50% less fat and lightly seasoned with delicious flavors like Sea Salt, Creamy Jalapeno, and Roasted Garlic. Because these crispy chips are air-popped with wholesome goodness, you can snack away without the guilt.

short_text: Introducing new Lay’s Sweet & Salty Poppables, the sweet & salty wholesome way to snack throughout your day.
full_text: Lay’s Sweet & Salty Poppables are delicious light, airy and perfectly popped potato bites that are gently dusted with sweet flavors like Cinnamon Sugar or Salted Caramel.  With a light crispy bite and a slightly indulgent flavor, they’re the perfect way to add a little sweet and salty reward to your day.

short_text: Introducing Tostitos Twists, a brand new fun-to-eat snack that puts a twist on your favorite tortilla chip.
full_text: Tostitos Twists are unique tortilla crisps that take two complementary flavored tortilla strips and twist them together for a brand new tortilla chip snack. Flavor combos like Cheddar & Jalapeño, White Cheddar & Parmesan, or Chile & Lime bring a new “twist” to your tortilla chip snack time. And with the convenient canister, you can take the fun and flavor anywhere you go.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Popcorn, combining the delicious taste of Cheetos with a classic family favorite - popcorn!
full_text: Cheetos Popcorn is seasoned with your favorite tasty Cheetos flavors from classic Mellow Cheddar, to exciting Flamin’ Hot, to indulgent Sweetos Caramel. Ready to go right out of the bag, it’s popcorn with an added boost of mischievous flavor and fun.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Poppables Scoops, the crispy potato chip that’s perfectly designed for dips and dip lovers.
full_text: Each Lay’s Poppables Scoop is a crispy potato chip in a perfectly scoopable shape that’s lightly seasoned with flavors designed to complement your favorite dips, like Sea Salt or White Cheddar & Chive. With a light texture but a sturdy shape, they’re the perfect chip to scoop and dip.

short_text: Introducing Ruffles Hot Sauc’d, your favorite Ruffles potato chips topped with an exciting, sauce-inspired layer for a multi-textured way to spice up your day and awaken your taste buds.
full_text: Ruffles Hot Sauc’d are crunchy ridged potato chips generously drizzled with a crispy coating with the epic flavor of your favorite bold sauces in every craveable bite. Available in varieties like Spicy Buffalo, Nashville Hot Honey, and Sriracha.

short_text: Introducing Smartfood Air Pops, a new line of air-popped snacks that gives you an even more fun way to enjoy the poppable nature of popcorn.
full_text: Smartfood Air Pops are bite-size, crispy snacks made with Smartfood popcorn transformed into a diamond-shaped, pillowy puff. These tasty bites have an open, airy middle which allows for delicious seasoning on the inside and out, so you get double the amazing cheesy flavor in every bite. Pop a handful of Air Pops anytime for a more fun snacking experience that won’t weigh you down.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Puzzles, the classic Cheetos you love in a fun, new form that will take your family’s fun and games to a tasty new level.
full_text: **_Cheetos Puzzles_** are thin and crispy Cheetos in puzzle-piece shapes ready to build into your next masterpiece. Seasoned with family favorites such as Cheddar or Flaming hot, they are the playfully cheesy snack that is perfect for mischievous fun for the whole family.

short_text: Introducing new Red Rock Deli Waffle Potato Thins, a blend of premium quality potatoes, gourmet cheeses and fresh herbs pressed into a waffle iron for a distinctive crunch.
full_text: Their crispy waffle texture enriches the flavor experience, making them an inviting evening snack to savor.

short_text: Introducing Doritos Insiders: All the flavor inside, with none of the mess outside!
full_text:
You’ll experience bold Doritos flavor in a whole new way... With every bite, you will enjoy the flavor packed inside the chip. No more need to stop texting, typing, gaming, surfing, or doing whatever you’re doing. 

You keep your focus – with nothing to clean up - because all the bold flavor you love is now inside the chip, not on your fingers.

short_text: Introducing Ruffles Crunch Bites, a collision of your favorite salty snacks in one crunchy bite-sized form for a multi-textured way to crunch the day away.
full_text: Each Ruffles Crunch Bite is made from crunchy visible pieces of Ruffles potato chips clustered together with a variety of pretzels, nuts and other salty elements, all in one munchable bite-sized snack and seasoned with craveable flavors. Available in a variety of craveable flavors like Cheddar, Spicy Buffalo, and Jalapeno Ranch.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Rodz, a cheesy snack that’s fun to eat and easy to munch, anywhere and everywhere.
full_text: Cheetos Rodz are extra-long, crunchy Cheetos seasoned with classic cheesy flavors such as Original Cheetos and Cheddar Jalapeno. And because they’re packaged in a single-serve, on-the-go sleeve, there’s less mess and even more Cheetos fun.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Flavor Crisps, potato crisps with flavorful ingredients blended and baked right into every bite for a special snack you can unwind with at the end of the day.
full_text: Each Lay’s Flavor Crisp is perfectly balanced with engaging herbs, spices and other flavorful ingredients blended into each light and airy crisp. Delectably crispy and delicately sophisticated, they’re perfect for enjoying on their own or pairing with your favorite cheese, spread or dip. Available in Sea Salt & Cracked Pepper, Spinach & Artichoke, and Garlic & Herb.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Popcorn Bites, delectable cheesy popcorn clusters with craveable Cheetos flavor for a supremely snackable way to transition into the evening.
full_text: Each Cheetos Popcorn Bite is made from a handful of cheesy Cheetos popcorn bits clustered into thin bite-sized pieces and dusted in your favorite Cheetos flavors. With varieties like Cheddar, White Cheddar, and Flamin’ Hot, they pack a rich cheesy punch in each delicious bite.

short_text: Introducing Doritos Jerky Chips, your favorite bold Doritos chip now amped up with protein to fuel you.
full_text: Doritos Jerky Chips are crunchy Doritos chips made with bits of jerky cooked into the chip and seasoned with intense Doritos flavors. They’re the epically crunchy and boldly flavored snack that’s big on the flavor and protein you need to keep you going. Available in flavors like Bacon Nacho, Spicy Sweet Chili Beef and Spicy Hot Wings.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Fireworks, the extreme stimulating puffs that excite the senses with invigorating, crackling bursts of flavor.
full_text: Cheetos Fireworks are fun-to-eat, bite-sized puffs lightly sprinkled with flavorful crackling seasoning that you can hear and feel in every bite. Available in varieties like Flamin’ Hot with Poppin’ Limon, Cheddar with Poppin’ Jalapeno, and Mango with Poppin’ Chilis.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Asteroids & Cheese Bites, a flavor-packed snack mix that not only helps you take a quick break—but also powers you up to win the day.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Cheesy Potato Bites, a real-food snack with an indulgent grown-up taste that’s perfect for serving at any get together.

Delectably crispy on the outside and melt in your mouth on the inside, they’re the golden bites that you’ll love to share with friends. Available in varieties like Cheddar & Herb, Parmesan & Garlic, and Smoked Cheddar & Onion.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Jalapeno Slices, the classic Cheetos puff you love in a fun new, poppable shape and in delicious flavors.

short_text: Introducing Ruffles Loaded Potato Bites, a fun and snackable version of a classic comfort food that will fill you up and keep you going.

Available in epic varieties like Sour Cream, Sharp Cheddar & Onion; or Smoky Bacon, Sharp Cheddar & Chive, they’re the perfect snack to satisfy your taste for big flavor and a hearty crunch.

short_text: Introducing Tostitos Hearty Dippers, the thick and tasty little tortilla chip that’s perfectly designed for heartier dips.

They’re sturdy enough to stand up to the thickest dips - like guacamole, black bean, and hummus – and designed with the right amount of flavor and the ideal shape to get the perfect amount of dip every time.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Crunch Pop, the ultimate combination of two snacking favorites for a special treat to share with family or friends.
full_text: Cheetos Crunch Pop is popcorn paired with mini, crunchy Cheetos – all seasoned with our classic cheesy flavors like Original Cheetos or Cheddar Jalapeno. Just heat them in the microwave for a bold new snack that brings cheesy crunch and mischievous fun to ordinary popcorn.

short_text: Introducing Ruffles Flavor Shots – intensely-flavored, poppable snacks that excite your mouth and wake up your senses.
full_text: Ruffles Flavor Shots delivers a burst of intensity with every bite, with flavor varieties like Spicy Buffalo Ranch or Tangy Limón. Ruffles Flavor Shots come in a convenient ready-to-go format so you can get your quick flavor boost and get going with your day.

short_text: Introducing Ruffles ReMix, a delicious protein cluster made with cheese, nuts and seeds all combined with bits of Ruffles to give you that fulfilling crunch with the energy you need take on the next challenge.
full_text: We’ve combined bits of Ruffles, cheese, nuts and seeds to give you that fulfilling crunch you love from Ruffles with the energy you need take on the next challenge. All these great ingredients combine to give you 5 grams of protein in a portable pack that can be tossed in your bag, kept on your desk, or eaten on the go whenever you need a protein boost.

short_text: Introducing new Lay’s Poppables Made with Real Vegetables, the colorful and wholesome way to snack through your day.

Because these crispy, colorful chips are popped with veggie goodness, you can snack away without the guilt.

short_text: Introducing Ruffles Flavor Shots Ridges, bite-sized, ridge-cut potato chips that are extra thick, extra crunchy and extra flavorful.
full_text:
Introducing Ruffles Flavor Shots Ridges, bite-sized, ridge-cut potato chips that are extra thick, extra crunchy and extra flavorful.

We’ve taken your favorite part of Ruffles – the ridges – and cut them into individual thick ridge bites and cooked them a little extra for a maximized crunchy taste experience. Varieties include:

•Hot Wings

short_text: Introducing Doritos Ignite, the intensely flavored snack mix with the flavor, crunch and engaging variety to charge you up and keep you going throughout the day.

Introducing Doritos Ignite, the intensely flavored snack mix with the flavor, crunch and engaging variety to charge you up and keep you going throughout the day.

short_text: Introducing Tostitos Chips and Queso Snack Mix, a delicious snacking combo in one easy-to-eat mix that satisfies your hunger.

Introducing Tostitos Chips and Queso Snack Mix, a delicious snacking combo in one easy-to-eat mix that satisfies your hunger.

Spend more time indulging and less time prepping with this delicious chips-and-queso-inspired snack mix. Each bag is filled with the perfect ratio of bite-sized Tostitos rounds and pieces of sharp & spicy 100% real pepper jack cheese, crunchified for instant snack gratification.

Available in convenient single-serve bags.

short_text: Introducing Smartfood Power On Mix, a new line of snacks that mixes your favorite crave-worthy and protein-packed snacks together to keep you going.
full_text: Smartfood Power On Mix is made from the clever combination of cheesy Smartfood popcorn, crunchy wheat squares, and seasoned nuts for the best blend of flavor, texture, and natural protein goodness to fuel yourself anytime. It comes in a stand-up, resealable bag so it’s easy to carry on-the-go, or prop upright wherever you need to power on. Keep your hunger at bay with the tastiest and most nutritious snack mix around: Smartfood Power On Mix.

short_text: Introducing Tostitos Veggie Tortilla Rounds, tasty tortilla chips that add vibrant flavor and goodness to everyday snacking.
full_text: Tostitos Veggie Tortilla Rounds are bite-sized tortilla chips made from wholesome and delicious veggie tortillas, like spinach, red pepper, and roasted tomato. Perfectly seasoned with flavors like Sea Salt, a Hint of Jalapeño or a Hint of Lime, they’re a colorful, flavorful, and good-for-you snack that’s fun for any occasion.

short_text: Introducing new Red Rock Deli Potato Flats, light and crispy baked flats carefully crafted from premium quality potatoes with the rustic tang of sourdough and flavorful herbs & spices.
full_text: Their crispy texture with carefully selected ingredients perfectly complement the experience of your favorite dips, spreads, or cheeses. The result is a savory, presentation-worthy cracker ideal for entertaining.

short_text: Introducing Tostitos Bite-Size Veggie Rounds – a colorful veggie chip that adds excitement and crunch to every dip.
full_text: Tostitos Bite-Size Veggie Rounds are a delicious fusion of real vegetables like tomatoes, spinach and carrots that are lightly seasoned and baked into a bite-size crispy tortilla chip. This colorful mix has more veggies than a traditional veggie chip and provides the satisfying crunch of classic tortilla chips with the goodness and nutrition of real vegetables.

short_text: Introducing Smartfood Treat Mix, a new line of salty and sweet popcorn snack mixes with crave-able pieces of your favorite bakery treats for a more special snacking treat.
full_text: Smartfood Treat Mix includes a salty and sweet blend of popcorn, salted raw nuts, and small morsels of bakery fresh treats, like fudgy brownie and chocolate chip cookie dough, enrobed in a smooth chocolate shell. You’ll get a sweet treat balanced out with the light, salty and crunchy goodness of popcorn and nutritious nuts. Best of all, this snack comes in a resealable bag to maintain bakery freshness, and is easy to grab anytime you need that little sweet treat to keep you going.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos X-tra, a puffed snack with two intense flavors all in one munchable bite.
full_text: **_Cheetos X-tra_** is packed with intense cheese flavor on the outside and another intense cheese flavor on the inside. With layered flavors like Swiss & Cheddar, these fun-shaped snacks are a perfect combination of cheese and more cheese that will ignite your senses all from one bite.

short_text: Introducing Sweetos Flavor Shots Cinnamon Twists, a delicious new treat that’s perfect for a pick-me-up reward any time of day.

Inspired by sweet Mexican treats, our Cinnamon Twists are light, puffed, bite-sized, cinnamon-sugary delights that are as great with a coffee in the morning as they are with a soda pop or water in the middle of the afternoon.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Day of the Dead, the classic Cheetos you love in new colorful shapes that make your Día De Los Muertos celebration extra fun for the whole family.
full_text: **_Cheetos Day of Dead_** are Cheetos puffs in bright, colorful shapes from Disney’s Coco® movie that are seasoned with traditional Mexican favorites such as White Cheddar Jalapeno. They are the playfully tasty snack that is perfect for mischievous fun for the whole family.

short_text: Introducing new Red Rock Deli Potato Hash Crisps, delightfully unique crisps carefully crafted from freshly shredded potatoes, fresh herbs, and cheeses.
full_text: Their crispy texture and natural flavor make them an inviting evening snack to savor.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Pretzel Thins, a supremely cheesy Cheetos take on classic, crunchy pretzel thins for a fun and unique snack that will excite your taste buds.

short_text: Introducing Lay's Holiday M&M's Clusters, festively crafted bite-sized snacks with the perfect salty-sweet flavor and crunch that are great for snacking or serving during the holidays.
full_text: Lay's Holiday M&M's Clusters bring together salty, sweet and oh-so-cheerful bits of Lay's Poppables potato chips, Smartfood popcorn, Rold Gold pretzels pieces and red and green chocolate M&M's in a fun and poppable bite-sized cluster. Conveniently packaged in a stand-up pouch, they're a delicious and playful addition to any holiday gathering.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Wavy Dippers, the extra-thick potato chip that stands up to even the heartiest dips!
full_text: Thicker than a traditional potato chip, Lay’s Wavy Dippers are real, perfectly curved chips made just for confident dipping. They hold more dip per chip and easily fit into any dip container. Available in simple savory flavors - like Classic, Garlic & Chive, or Sea Salt & Black Pepper - they pair perfectly with any dip.

short_text: Introducing Doritos Trios:  Flavor combinations in one bag for a unique and exciting snacking experience!
full_text:
Each bag has an assortment of three distinctly flavored chips.  Alone each chip tastes great, but mix them up to create exciting combinations that add up to taste like your favorite foods. 

For example, Cheese flavor + Ketchup + Smoked Beef = Cheeseburger!

short_text: Introducing Tostitos Hint of Habanero, a delicious bite-sized chip lightly seasoned with the spicy flavor of habanero chili peppers!
full_text: Tostitos Hint of Habanero chips are bite-sized tortilla rounds seasoned with just a touch of the spicy flavor of habanero chili peppers to give you just the right amount of heat. They are made of premium white corn and lightly seasoned with spicy habanero perfect for adding a little heat to any salsa or dip. The spicy flavored tortilla chips are available in a multi-serve bag to bring any gathering to life or in an individual sized bag for a satisfyingly spicy snack just for you.

short_text: Off the Eaten Path Veggie flats are vegetable chips that taste so good that you’ll never believe it!

- Made by chip lovers (who also happen to love veggies too)

short_text: Introducing Doritos Mini Bars – crunchy and chewy triangular bars that fill you up, so you spend less time snacking and more time doing.

short_text: Introducing Doritos Double-Edge – dual-flavored chips that battle in your mouth, kicking all your senses into a higher gear.

short_text: CRISP & DIP a snack when you need a bite that is a little more filling. The snack is a warm, ready to make snack in your microwave that you is paired with your favorite dip.
full_text:
The snack is made from a **few natural ingredients** (water, a pinch of salt, and multigrain). The **process is simple** - the ingredients are mixed to form a dough, then shaped, and finally airdried - a natural way of preservation that ensures all the nutritional value of the ingredients remains, which makes this a healthier snack choice.​

CRISP & DIP is a **crispy and airy snack freshly made** in the microwave. Ready in under a minute! It comes in individual servings in a range of flavors (e.g. Asiago Cheese, Sea Salt, Cool Ranch). ​

Make CRISP & DIP in **four easy steps**:​

Step 1: Separate the dip from the snack​

Step 2: Microwave for less than 1 minute and watch it transform​

Step 3: Dip and enjoy!​

​Dips are **included and come in a variety of flavors** (e.g. Guacamole and Hummus).​

CRISP & DIP is made with recyclable materials so is good for the planet!​

Available in flavors like: Cheddar Cheese, Sour Cream & Chive, Bacon Cheddar.

short_text: Introducing new Red Rock Deli Cheese & Potato Crisps, delightfully unique crisps carefully crafted from premium quality potatoes, gourmet cheeses and fresh herbs.
full_text: Their distinct layered texture enriches the flavor experience, making them an inviting evening snack to savor.

short_text: Introducing Tostitos Habanero, an extremely spicy bite-sized chip to spice up your tortilla chip snacking!
full_text: Tostitos Habanero chips are bite-sized tortilla rounds bursting with the extremely spicy flavor of habanero chili peppers. They are made of premium white corn and seasoned with habaneros perfect for adding heat to any salsa or dip. The exceptionally spicy flavored tortilla chips are available in a multi-serve bag to bring any gathering to life or in an individual sized bag for a satisfyingly spicy snack just for you.

short_text: Introducing Doritos Ultra Dips, a new range of popped, ultra-dippable chips that let you dip more boldly than ever.
full_text:
These new intensely seasoned Doritos have a crunchy, cratery popped surface designed to hold more bold-flavored dip on every dunk. Crunch into craters of bold flavor of dip and chip with every bite. Plus these dip-inspired flavors pair exceptionally well with your favorite dips so you can 'double dip' and take flavor to the next level.

Available in bold flavors like:

- Scorchin' Salsa (try pairing with your favorite guacamole)
- Spicy Guac (try pairing with your favorite salsa)
- Chipotle Queso (try pairing with your favorite bean dip)

Never Fried.

short_text: Introducing Doritos Twisted Dippers, chips with a twisted shape for dipping, dunking and shoveling dips and salsas.
full_text: Doritos Twisted Dippers are shaped to create a wave that is ready to dip and scoop. We’ve made it easier to get more flavor from your dipping experience. Available in flavors like: Nacho Cheese, Cool Ranch, Chile Limón.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Stix, crispy, puffed potato snacks that have the perfect crunch.
full_text: Lay’s Stix feature the satisfying crunchy snap of munchable potato sticks. Light and airy, each bite is flavored with easy to eat, craveable flavors. Available in flavors like: Sea Salt, Rosemary Garlic, Cheddar & Sour Cream.

short_text: Introducing Evolve Canyon Chips, made with whole food ingredients that give you a powerful combination of protein and fiber to keep you fueled for the day ahead.
full_text: Our Canyon chips are made with plant-based, whole food ingredients that you can feel good about. Baked with quinoa and red lentil, these chips offer 5g of plant-based protein and 5g of fiber that provide the nutrition and energy you need to get you through your day. Available in the following flavors: Lightly Salted, Barbecue, Jalapeno.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Crunchy Flamin’ Hot, a spicy snack that delivers intense heat that keeps on building!
full_text: Cheetos Flamin’ Hot contains the unmistakable cheesy crunch that you love from Cheetos combined with intense and building heat for a fiery snacking experience. Grab these Flamin’ Hot Cheetos for an experience you will want to tell your friends about. The spicy flavored Cheetos are available in a multi-serve bag to bring any gathering to life or in an individual sized bag for a satisfyingly spicy snack just for you.

short_text: Introducing Doritos Crunch Sticks, the bold flavor and crunch of Doritos now in a snack that’s ready to eat on-the-go.
full_text: Doritos Crunch Sticks are crunchy, craveable snack sticks seasoned with big bold Doritos flavors. And because they’re packaged in a handy sleeve, you can bring the big flavor and crunch anywhere you go. Available in flavors like Nacho Cheese, Cool Ranch and Salsa Verde.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Kettle Cooked Glazed, extra crunchy chips made even more flavorful and delicious with a savory glaze.
full_text: Lay’s Kettle Cooked Glazed are thick-cut, small batch kettle cooked chips that are coated in flavorful glazes for a complex taste. Available in flavors like: Smoky Bourbon BBQ, Sweet Soy Chili and Honey Butter.

short_text: Introducing new Doritos Fuel Ups, a range of bold and satisfying Doritos made to stomp out hunger any time it strikes.
full_text: These intensely flavorful Doritos bring a thicker crunch, a boost of protein and are leveled up with chickpeas for a great-tasting snack that helps hold hunger at bay. Available in classic Doritos flavors: Nacho Cheese, Cool ranch.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Puffs, these delightfully airy potato puff bites are perfect to munch by the handful.
full_text: Lay’s Puffs are light, airy and puffed-up potato bites with a delicate, flaky center. Each poppable puff practically melts in your mouth. Lightly seasoned with classic Lay’s flavors, these poppable snacks are a cozy, comforting snack. Available in flavors like: Sea Salt, Sour Cream & Cheddar and Honey BBQ.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Pop-dulgences, a new range of chips popped full of sweetly decadent flavor for a snack that lets you indulge in something you can feel good about.
full_text:
Each bite-sized popped potato chip is lightly dusted with sweet seasoning and then popped full of indulgent flavors like dulce or dark chocolate right inside the chip to create a snack full of irresistibly indulgent flavor that’s still unbelievably light and crispy. Always popped and never fried so you can reward yourself without thinking twice.

Available in decadent varieties like:

- Dulce Churro
- Honey S’mores
- Sea Salt Dark Chocolate

short_text: Introducing Lay's Sweet & Salty Snack Mix, a craveable mix of your favorite salty snacks mixed with sweet to surprise and delight you with every bite.
full_text: We combine crispy Lay’s potato chips, chocolate covered pretzels, and caramel popcorn for a rich and delectable snack. Treat yourself to a delicious and munchable experience that will be sure to delight.  Available in the following flavors: Original Sweet & Salty, Cookies & Cream, and Peanut Butter & Chocolate

short_text: Introducing Doritos Chickpuffs, a new range of super-snackable chickpea puffs that bring together the bold Doritos flavor you love with the goodness of chickpeas for a fun, feel-good snack.
full_text:
These fun, light and airy chickpea-shaped puffs are flavor-blasted with the intensely bold flavors of your favorite Doritos. They sneak in the goodness of chickpea and have some protein and fiber without ever sacrificing flavor. They're so playfully poppable, you might not put them down.

Available in great-tasting Doritos flavors like:

- Nacho Cheese
- Cool Ranch

3g of protein and a good source of fiber.

short_text: Introducing Smartfood Popped Bites, light and airy corn popped snacks drizzled with sweet coatings that make snack time fun and delicious without weighing you down.
full_text: We take the ingredient that Smartfood is known for - corn - and we puff it into a playfully crunchy, bite-sized snack. And to create an irresistibly delicious snack, we drizzle it in delectable yet light coatings for extra flavor. It's a different take on popcorn, one that's sweet, delightfully crunchy, and totally satisfying but never weighs you down. Available in the following flavors: Dark Chocolate, Vanilla Honey, and Peanut Butter

short_text: Two of the most delicious flavors on Earth – cinnamon and milled cane sugar – meet the crunchiness of Stacy’s Pita Chips.
full_text:
A nostalgic mix of cinnamon and sweetness create the perfect snack for your delectable snacking moments. 

Baked, Made with Real Pita Bread, Non-GMO Project Verified.

short_text: Introducing new CrunchPops, a range of great-tasting, roasted chickpeas with the cheesy Cheetos flavors you love for a dangerously delicious, feel-good snack that'll keep you crunching through your day.
full_text: We start with real chickpeas, roast them to crunchy golden perfection and then blast them with the intensely cheesy flavors of Cheetos for a full flavor experience. Inherently good, with 5g of protein from chickpeas themselves. Fun to eat and mischievously munchable, the perfect snack to add some pop to your day. Available in great-tasting Cheetos flavors like: Cheddar, Cheddar Jalapeno, Flamin’ Hot

short_text: Introducing a new kind of irresistibly satisfying chips from Lay's Baked full of flavor straight from the kitchen.
full_text:
These delicious chips are loaded full of rich, culinary-inspired flavor from real ingredients like chickpea baked right into the chip. With a thicker, extra-crispy crunch for a truly hearty snack that satisfies in a joyfully delicious way. 

Available in delicious slow-crafted flavors such as: 

- Sun-Dried Tomato & Herb
- Roasted Garlic & Parmesan 
- Greek Yogurt & Green Onion

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Churros, Cheetos’ take on the classic sweet snack for the fun-to-eat afternoon pick-me-up.
full_text: Cheetos Churros are crispy, crunchy puffed sticks seasoned with enticing sweet flavors for an engaging taste and texture that’s perfect anywhere you go. Available in flavors like Cinnamon Sugar, Caramel, or Mexican Chocolate.

short_text: Introducing New Sun Pops, a crunchy, wholesome snack that you can eat on the go.
full_text:
Introducing New Sun Pops, a crunchy, wholesome snack that you can eat on the go.

Sun Pops are the perfect bite sized snack to keep you fueled during your busy day. These one-bite snacks with a big taste have a crunchy SunChips multi-grain outside and are packed with a creamy nut butter on the inside. Available in delicious flavors that won’t crumble or get your fingers messy.

Available in the following great flavors: 
- Peanut butter crunch
- Almond butter crunch

All other SunChips products are still available.

short_text: Introducing PopCorners Air Crisps, ultra-thin, airy PopCorners that practically melt in your mouth.
full_text: PopCorners Air Crisps take the better-for-you, never fried popped corn crisp and make it thinner and lighter than ever. Each wafer-like triangle has a crisp snap that then melts away as you enjoy them. Perfect to eat one by one or to use as crackers for your favorite spreads or cheese tray. Each crispy bite is light but satisfying. Available in the following flavors: White Cheddar, Sea Salt & Caramel, and Kettle Corn

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Cheesy Bites, the supremely cheesy poppable snack made with real cheese for even bigger cheesy flavor to help you power through your day.
full_text:
Introducing Cheetos Cheesy Bites, the supremely cheesy poppable snack made with real cheese for even bigger cheesy flavor to help you power through your day.

Cheetos Cheesy Bites are extra crunchy, bite-sized snacks with real cheese baked right in for even more satisfying and super cheesy flavor. Available in exciting, real cheese flavors like Sharper Cheddar, Peppery Jack, Smokin’ Mozzarella, they’re the craveable snack that packs maximum cheesy flavor into every crunchy bite.

short_text: Introducing new Red Rock Deli Potato and Cheese Wafer Thins, a blend of premium quality potatoes, gourmet cheeses and fresh herbs pressed into melt in your mouth wafer thins.
full_text: Their light and airy wafer texture enriches the flavor experience, making them an inviting evening snack to savor.

short_text: Introducing Doritos Black Bean, the classic Doritos you know and love made with a protein-packed black bean base to create a snacking experience you can feel good about.

short_text: Introducing PopCorners Crunchers, packed with grains, nuts and seeds for an extra crunchy and hearty bite.
full_text: PopCorners Crunchers are extra-crunchy, triangle-shaped popped corn snacks made with bits of grains, nuts and seeds in every bite for a multi-textural experience. Seasoned with bold flavors, they are perfect to pop one by one. Available in Flavors Like: Aged Sharp Cheddar, Sweet Chili and White Cheddar Jalapeno.

short_text: Introducing a new take on whole grain Sun Chips - made with ancient grains, they're a high-fiber, high-protein chip that will give you the perfect pick-me-up any time of day.
full_text: We've taken our classic Sun Chips and made them with a nutritious, filling sorghum, quinoa, and chia base - available in delicious Harvest Cheddar flavor, this satisfying snack will give you the lasting energy you need to power through whatever lies ahead. Available in the following flavors: Harvest Cheddar, Garden Salsa, Chili Lime.

short_text: Introducing Tostitos Minis – the bite-sized tortilla chips you know and love from Tostitos in a new, poppable format.
full_text:
Tostitos Minis pack a crispy crunch into a bite-sized snack and are perfectly seasoned with light flavors. Tostitos Minis come in a convenient, portable pack and make for the perfect afternoon pick-me-up at work, school or on-the go. 

Flavors:
Hint of Lime
Hint of Jalapeno 
Hint of Spicy Queso

short_text: Introducing Ruffles Flavor Shots Mighty Bites, the newest way to enjoy your favorite Ruffles flavors.
full_text:
Introducing Ruffles Flavor Shots Mighty Bites, the newest way to enjoy your favorite Ruffles flavors.

Mighty Bites are delicious mini-clusters of crushed Ruffles and nuts rolled together for a protein-packed, satisfying snack to tide you over for your next task. Ruffles Flavor Shots Mighty Bites give you the intense Ruffles flavors you love in a new format to help sustain you. Enjoy your favorite Ruffles flavors in these convenient, on-the-go snack packs.

Varieties include:

•Flamin’ Hot

•Jalapeño Ranch

•Hot Wings

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Layers, a multi-layered snack with a crispy-crunch and a melt-in-your mouth finish for a stop-and-savor moment at the end of a long day.
full_text: Lay’s Layers are a bite-sized snack made from light-and-airy layers of potato, lightly seasoned with deliciously craveable flavors. With varieties like Sea Salt, Honey BBQ, and White Cheddar, they’re the light, bite-sized snack to help melt the day away.

short_text: Introducing Doritos Xtra, indulgently bold and extra thick tortilla chips with flavors inspired by the foods you love late at night.
full_text: Doritos Xtra are extra thick chips dusted with delicious seasonings inspired by late night menus. Each chip delivers all-in, textured taste and a deep crunch that satisfies. Available in the following flavors: Street Taco, Pepperoni Pizza, and Bacon Cheeseburger

short_text: Introducing Sweetos Filled Cookie Puffs, cookie puffs filled with deliciously sweet fillings that brings crunch and creaminess together, in one bite-sized treat.
full_text: We transform our beloved puffs into a filled cookie: a crispy graham cookie outside, filled with delectable, sweet cream on the inside. It's finished with a dusting of cinnamon and sugar for the finger-licking goodness you know and love. It's a crunchy-creamy, sweet, irresistible snack!  Available in the following flavors: Peanut Butter, Salted Caramel, and Chocolate Peanut Butter

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Flavor Shots Mini-Crisps, an airy, crispy version of America’s favorite potato snack that you can enjoy by the handful!
full_text:
Introducing Lay’s Flavor Shots Mini-Crisps, an airy, crispy version of America’s favorite potato snack that you can enjoy by the handful!

When you want the delicious, savory taste that only a great potato chip can bring, but want something that’s a little lighter and easy to enjoy on the go, these fun-to-eat 3D snacks are just the answer. Satisfy that craving for something savory without weighing yourself down.

Varieties include:

•Creamy Jalapeño

•White Cheddar

•Sweet Chili

short_text: Introducing PopCorners Cubes, delightfully light and airy snacks bursting with flavor through every square inch.
full_text: PopCorners Cubes are deliciously snackable. We pop popping corn into tasty, poppable, mini squares. Each cubed bite is packed with concentrated flavor sure to satisfy your hunger, without weighing you down. Enjoy by the handful, or simply munch and crunch one by one. Available in the following flavors: White Cheddar, Parmesan & Garlic, and Buffalo Ranch

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Ignite, a boldly flavored snack mix to charge you up and keep you going throughout the day.
full_text: Each handful of **Cheetos Ignite** combines fun spicy shapes packed with intense heat and crunch. With supremely bold flavors like Flamin’ Hot and Kickin’ Jalapeno Cheddar, these fiery-shaped snacks are sure to excite your sense and spice up your day.

short_text: Introducing Dorito-rónes, two classic snacks – Doritos and savory pork rinds – together for a new flavor and crunch.
full_text: Dorito-rónes are crispy, airy chicharrones. These light, yet satisfying, fried pork rinds are covered in classic Doritos flavors to create a dynamic and hearty new snack. Available in flavors like: Flamin’ Hot Habanero, Nacho Cheese and Honey Barbecue.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Curls, inspired by curly fries these puffed snacks have a light crunch.
full_text:
Lay’s Curls are light, crunchy and ready-to-eat potato snacks shaped into an irresistible mix of spirals and curves. Grab a handful to enjoy a light, nostalgic bite with craveable flavor. 

Available in flavors like: Classic Garlic, Onion + Paprika, Sea Salt, Honey BBQ.

short_text: Introducing Cheetos FlavorFills, the bite-sized snack with craveable cheesy flavor on both the inside and the outside, for a flavorful pick-me-up to fuel your day.
full_text: Each Cheetos FlavorFills is a crispy bite-sized snack with delicious Cheetos seasoning on the outside and supremely cheesy Cheetos flavor on the inside. With flavors like Cheddar, White Cheddar and Flamin’ Hot, they’re double the flavor and double the fun.

short_text: Introducing SunChips Nature Crisps, tasty whole grain crisps made to reenergize your body and senses.
full_text:
Introducing SunChips Nature Crisps, tasty whole grain crisps made to reenergize your body and senses.
 
Give your body a boost with nutrient-packed grains, fruits, and nuts as you wake up your mouth with invigorating flavor and texture combinations. These flat crisps are made with the 6 whole grains found in SunChips—oats, rice, quinoa, wheat, corn, amaranth, and sorghum, all puffed to perfection—plus bits of chopped nuts and dried fruit. The colorful crisps are lightly seasoned and slightly sweet, and every bite is an exciting mix of crunchy and chewy.
 
Try all the great combinations, like:
- Cranberry, almond, and vanilla
- Apricot, pistachio, and honey
- Cherry, cashew, and cinnamon
 
Available in convenient single-serve bags.

short_text: Introducing a new range of irresistibly delicious snacks from Lay's that open up a world of joyful flavor inspired by the incredible tastes and fun to eat foods of the world's food markets, halls and bazaars.
full_text:
Discover a different taste experience beyond your typical everyday chip with these super snackable chickpea fries. Made from an authentically delicious blend of potato and chickpea and then deliciously seasoned with the vibrant flavors found the world over. Let us take you on a flavor tour to a few of our favorite places.

Available in uniquely irresistible flavors like:

- Habanero Limon
- Greek Yogurt & Dill
- Madras Curry & Coconut
- Moroccan Za'atar Spice

short_text: Introducing Rold Gold Protein-filled Pretzels, deliciously filling snacks that provide long-lasting energy.
full_text:
Introducing Rold Gold Protein-filled Pretzels, deliciously filling snacks that provide long-lasting energy.

These Rold Gold pretzel nuggets have a tasty protein-packed filling for a perfect combination of sweet and salty flavors and creamy, crunchy textures. Each filling has added whey protein to keep you satisfied longer.

Choose from great-tasting options like:

- Vanilla Yogurt
- Almond Butter
- Chocolate Hazelnut

Available in convenient single-serve bags.

short_text: Introducing Tostitos Dippers – the deliciously dippable chip perfectly suited for every type of dip.
full_text: Tostitos Dippers are sturdy enough to handle your favorite dips like guacamole, while delivering on the same delicious crunch and texture you love from Tostitos. These boat shaped chips make it easy to scoop just the right amount of thick dip that you love onto every bite, without worrying about your chip breaking.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Veggie Poppables - a snack so tasty that even the pickiest eaters will love the real veggies mixed right in.
full_text:
We took our light and crispy textured Lay’s Poppables and blended them with ingredients like sweet potato, carrot and spinach to create a deliciously fun snack with a positive twist. Go ahead and grab them by the handful! 

Available in:

- Sea Salt
- White Cheddar
- Ranch

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Poptizers, a new range of real food-inspired flavor experiences popped right into the chip for truly elevated snacking enjoyment.
full_text:
Popped potato chips deliciously seasoned and popped full of irresistible flavor from real ingredients you can see right in the chip. With a light, thin and crispy popped texture that’s incredibly snackable so you can delight in something you can feel good about.

Available in deliciously elevated flavors like:

- Caramelized Onion & Chive
- Garlic & Parmesan
- Asiago Herb

Never Fried.

short_text: Introducing new Doritos Boost'd, a range of boldly boosted Doritos made to give you the delicious mini boost you need whenever you start to feel the lag.
full_text: These intensely flavorful Doritos bring a thicker crunch, a boost of protein and are chickpea-enhanced for a great-tasting snack that'll keep you charged up. Available in classic Doritos flavors: Nacho Cheese, Cool ranch

short_text: Introducing Smartfood Dipped Bites, a new line of salty and sweet popcorn clusters partially dipped in chocolate for an extra special treat.
full_text: Smartfood Dipped Bites are made from salted popcorn, roasted nuts, and sweet dried fruit – rolled together into a bite-sized ball, and partially dipped into velvety milk chocolate. Pop a Dipped Bite into your mouth and experience that perfect salty-with-a-touch-of-sweet taste, so you can reward yourself without going overboard indulgent. Best of all, these snacks are available in a resealable pouch, so you can savor them anytime, anywhere.

short_text: Mouthwatering flavor from your favorite Mediterranean spread in a light and airy chip!
full_text:
Taste real ingredients, like chickpeas and rice, now in one never-fried complete snacking package. Enjoy the flavor of creamy hummus with a bright, herbal taste from rosemary and olive oil. 

Gluten Free, No Artificial Flavors or Colors, Non-GMO Project Verified

short_text: Introducing Fritos Rounds, the hearty crunch of Fritos, now available in round chips great for dipping, topping, dunking or spreading.
full_text: Fritos Rounds help you take Fritos snacking to new places. Use them as a cracker for any spread, or top with melted cheese and enjoy as a nacho. Available in flavors like: Cheddar & Sour Cream, Honey BBQ and Original.

short_text: Introducing Popcorners Birthday Cake, an all-new flavor mashup drizzling Popcorners with vanilla frosting and sprinkled so that it can be your birthday every day.
full_text: We take our classic, airy chip and add rainbow sprinkles for a pop of color, plus a light vanilla frosting drizzle for the best of both worlds - the enjoyment you crave from a flavorful sweet treat, but without weighing you down. Available in the following flavors: Birthday Cake, Apple Pie, and Brownie

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Curly Fry Chips, the classic flavor kick, crispy crunch and spiraled fun you love, now in an easy to munch snacks straight off the shelf.
full_text: Lay’s Curly Fry Chips are light, crunchy and ready-to-eat potato spirals seasoned and cooked to perfection. Enjoying each flavorful and unique twist, turn and curve keeps you coming back for more. Available in the following flavors: Classic Seasoning, Sea Salt, Cajun

short_text: Introducing PopCorners Clusters, delightfully poppable cubes of mixed salty treats.
full_text: PopCorners Clusters are snack cubes made with mini bits of PopCorners, nuts, seeds and other tasty ingredients. Each cluster is bound together with savory or sweet flavors that are sure to keep you going and satisfy your cravings all in one bite. Available in flavors like: Sweet & Salty Kettle, White Cheddar and Sea Salt.

- 4 Doritos Spicy Nacho
- 4 Ruffles Cheddar & Sour Cream
- 4 Smartfood White Cheddar

- 4 Snickers Original

short_text: Boring crackers just got a bold new facelift, with artisan baked crackers in big flavors that deliver a break from the norm.
full_text: Bite-sized, poppable crackers made with exciting ingredients that offer a bolder taste and more unique flavors than traditional crackers e.g. smoky BBQ flavor.

short_text: Introducing new Lay’s Baked Taste Journeys, a range of delicious, globally-inspired snacks that journey beyond your typical potato chip by using real chickpea to deliver a truly authentic, exotic taste experience.

Oven-baked to crispy perfection for a mouth-watering snack that will take you and your guests on a true taste journey. Available in delicious globally-inspired flavors like: Roasted Garlic, Spiced Red Curry, Sun-dried Tomato & Smoked Paprika

short_text: The comforting taste of classic grilled cheese in a light and crispy cracker that you can savor freely
full_text: Crunchy, golden-baked crackers surrounding a deliciously cheesy filling for a comforting taste inspired by your favorite grilled cheese sandwich.

short_text: Introducing Doritos Armored, the Doritos chips you love with intense, energizing flavors brought to life via a unique crunchy coating that ensures all the flavor goes to your mouth, not your hands.

These chips provide a heartier Doritos bite with intense flavors that don’t leave a mess. Available in varieties like Buffalo Ranch, Nacho Cheese, and Flamin’ Hot.

short_text: Introducing PopCorners Minis, the miniature version of the triangle popped corn chips, a snack that won’t weigh you down.

These irresistibly munchable and guilt-free snacks are perfect to scoop up and enjoy by the handful, or simply munch and crunch one by one. Available in flavors like: Sea Salt, Kettle Corn and White Cheddar.

short_text: Introducing Munchies Fuel Mix, a satisfying snack mix that fills you up with an exciting crunch and blast of flavor.

Introducing Munchies Fuel Mix, a satisfying snack mix that fills you up with an exciting crunch and blast of flavor.
 
Conquer busy days with this crunchy mix, featuring Mini Lay’s Poppables, Rold Gold Mini Pretzels, and Baken-ets Pork Rinds. -BBQ
-Cheese

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Melts, ultra light and airy, super cheesy, melt-in-your mouth puffs that let the day melt away in each indulgent bite.

short_text: Introducing Sweetos Flavor Shots Churro Bites, a delicious new treat that’s perfect for a pick-me-up reward any time of day.
full_text:

Inspired by the sweet Mexican treat, our Churro Bites are light, puffed, bite-sized, cinnamon-sugary delights that are as great with a coffee in the morning as they are with a soda pop or water in the middle of the afternoon.

short_text: Introducing Fritos Corn Balls, the big flavor of Fritos, now in a light, airy, poppable snack.
full_text: Fritos Corn Balls are deliciously airy spheres, with a  satisfyingly crunchy exterior. Each bite brings you satisfying crunch and loads of flavor, for an irresistible snacking experience. Available in flavors like: Cheese, Chili Cheese, and Honey BBQ

short_text: Share something everyone can feel good about, with these unique, flatbread-inspired crackers.
full_text: Thin and crispy oval shaped crackers, oven-baked to perfection and topped with a range of mouthwatering toppings and seasonings.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Cheese Mix, a tasty mix of crunchy potato chips and protein-packed cheddar cheese bites that give you the salty snack you crave and protein you need.

short_text: PERFECT POPPER is a new and fun way of making freshly made warm, crispy snack in your microwave.
full_text:
The snack is made from a **few natural ingredients** (water, a pinch of salt, and multigrain). The process is simple- the ingredients are mixed to form a dough then shaped and finally airdried. The snack is free from preservatives making it a healthier snack choice.​

PERFECT POPPER is a **crispy and airy snack freshly made** in the microwave. Ready in 3 minutes or less! It comes in individual servings in a range of flavors. ​

​Purchase a starter pack that comes with everything you need  - a BPA-free reusable microwave-safe container, flavoring oil, and the snack. ​

Make PERFECT POPPER in four easy steps:​

Step 1: Pour your desired amount of product into the microwave-safe container​

Step 2: Spray 1 - 2 squirts of the flavoring oil onto the product​

Step 3: Compress the container then

Step 4: Place the container into the microwave and warm for 3 mins or less​

​The PERFECT POPPER is **reusable** - good for the planet and you!

short_text: Introducing new Doritos FWD, the bold flavor of Doritos now with an even bolder crunch and a boost of protein for a snack that’ll always keep you moving forward.
full_text:
These great-tasting Doritos tortilla chips are amped up with a bigger, thicker crunch and a boost of plant protein for a deliciously satisfying snack that brings even more boldness to snack time so you can stay unstoppably you.

Available in bold classic flavors like:

- Nacho Cheese
- Cool Ranch

4g of protein and good source of fiber per serving.

short_text: Introducing Doritos Ultra Dips, a new range of popped chips that combines a light dippable snack with a surprising crunch.
full_text:
These new intensely seasoned Doritos are popped to be perfectly light and dippable while still packing a bold crunch. Plus these dip-inspired flavors pair exceptionally well with your favorite dips so you can 'double dip' and take flavor to the next level.

Available in bold flavors like:

- Scorchin' Salsa (try pairing with your favorite guacamole)
- Spicy Guac (try pairing with your favorite salsa)
- Chipotle Queso (try pairing with your favorite bean dip)

Never Fried.

short_text: Introducing a new range of irresistibly delicious, culinary-inspired snacks from Lay's crafted full real food flavor in every bite.
full_text:
Every crispy chip is crafted with an inspired blend of chef-selected flavors from real ingredients like roasted chickpeas and tasty veggies baked right into the chip for real flavor you can see. Then finished with just the right spices and seasonings to elevate the whole taste experience. Enjoy a snack that will delight your inner foodie.

Available in a range of exceptionally delicious flavors like:

- Roasted Red Pepper & Feta Tapenade with Chickpea
- Lemony Veg & Chickpea
- Roasted Tomato, Herb & Chickpea
- Curried Chickpea & Onion

short_text: Introducing Doritos Pro, a new range of intensely flavorful, boosted Doritos that deliver a great-tasting way to always stay on your game.
full_text:
These crunchy chips bring the iconic flavors of Doritos you love then levels them up with plant based protein for a snack that helps you power through your day in a boldly delicious way.

Available in bold classic flavors like: 

- Nacho Cheese
- Cool Ranch

7g of protein per serving.

short_text: Introducing Flavored Tortilla Chips by Food for Good: Tortilla chips you can feel confident eating that also make your taste buds sing.
full_text:
Packed with big flavor, these crunchy chips are **cooked in sunflower oil** and perfectly seasoned to create a yummy, savory experience. They’re **made with ingredients you know** and are perfect to enjoy on-the-go or share with friends!

Tortilla Chips are available in:

- White Cheddar
- Zesty Ranch

**Made with no artificial colors, flavors or preservatives.**

**Always Non-GMO. Made with USDA Organic Corn.**

short_text: Introducing Aero Doritos, the bold yet light new way to enjoy Doritos that’s ultra-grazable without ever weighing you down.
full_text:
These deliciously seasoned Doritos bring together bold flavor with a new aero-popped texture that is light yet crunchy for a snack that is even more effortlessly munchable. Plus they're never fried so you can enjoy even more chips, with less calories! Perfect on its own or as a bold yet light complement to any meal.

Available in both delicious new and classic flavors like:

- Smooth Queso
- Nacho Cheese
- Cool Ranch

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Pillow Crisps, golden-fried potato snack puffs that are crisp and airy pillow pockets.
full_text: Lay’s Pillow Crisps are perfectly crispy on the outside and puffed up to be hollow on the inside. Lightly seasoned with  herbs and spices, these crispy delights give you crunchy satisfaction. Available in flavors like: Asiago Herb, Rosemary Garlic, Sea Salt & Pepper.

short_text: Introducing Fritos Crunch Clusters, a super crunchy snack with hearty textured bits and bold flavor.
full_text: Fritos Crunch Clusters are small, poppable clusters made with salty, corny Fritos, crunchy nuts and  pretzels, and crisp, puffed rice. Pop ‘em one by one or by the handful for a satisfying bite. Available in flavors like: Barbecue, Honey Mustard and Original.

short_text: Introducing Doritos Rugged, a textured Doritos chip combined with delicious protein-packed ingredients to create a snack that will keep you fueled throughout your day.
full_text: This enhanced Doritos chip includes the bold nacho cheese flavor you crave, with an added boost of plant-based protein. The bean and seeds base offers 5g of protein per serving, just enough to satisfy your craving. Available in the following flavors: Nacho Cheese, Cool Ranch, Spicy Ranch

short_text: Introducing Cheetos Chickpuffs, a new range of super-snackable chickpea puffs that bring together the playfully cheesy Cheetos flavor you love with the goodness of chickpeas for a fun, feel-good snack.
full_text:
These fun, light and airy chickpea-shaped puffs are flavor-blasted with the deliciously cheesy tastes of Cheetos. They sneak in the goodness of chickpea and have some protein and fiber without ever sacrificing flavor. They're so playfully poppable, you might not put them down.

Available in fun Cheetos flavors like:

- Cheddar
- Cheddar Jalapeno
- Flamin’ Hot

3g of protein and a good source of fiber.

short_text: Introducing Smartfood Fruit Blast, popcorn dusted with real fruit powder for a playfully smart and fruity snack you can feel good about.
full_text: We take delicious popcorn and we mix it up with powdered fruit that's bursting with flavor. Amazingly sweet and delicious flavor combinations pair together effortlessly  for an easy, feel-good snack. Available in the following flavors: Mixed Berry, Apple Cinnamon, and Raspberry White Chocolate

short_text: Introducing Chester’s Pop Up Diner, a new range of snacks where he’s gotten his paws on your cheesy food faves and playfully pop’d them into chips for a full-on flavor explosion in every bite.
full_text:
These incredibly delicious snacks take the bold cheesy flavors of fun foods like pizza or cheeseburgers and pop and press them right into the snack for a flavor explosion you can see and taste. Dusted with Cheetle and with a crispy, popped texture that is supremely snackable without ever weighing you down.

Available in full-on flavors like:

- Xxtra Cheesy Pepperoni Pizza
- Ultra Chees’d Burger
- Jalapeno Cheezy Mac

Never Fried.

short_text: Introducing a new range of irresistibly delicious snacks from Lay's Sensations that open up a world of joyful flavor inspired by the incredible tastes and fun to eat foods of the world's food markets, halls and bazaars.
full_text:
Discover a different taste experience beyond your typical everyday chip with these super snackable chickpea fries. Made from an authentically delicious blend of potato and chickpea and then deliciously seasoned with the vibrant flavors found the world over. Let us take you on a flavor tour to a few of our favorite places. 

Available in uniquely irresistible flavors like: 

- Habanero Limon
- Greek Yogurt & Dill
- Madras Curry & Coconut
- Moroccan Za'atar Spice

short_text: Introducing Drizzled PopCorners, popped chips lightly drizzled with savory dips, for a little more satisfaction but without the guilt.
full_text: Drizzled PopCorners bring together light and airy popped corn chips and flavorful veggie-based dip drizzles in a convenient and easy to eat snack. Available in flavors like: Spinach Artichoke, Hummus and Tapenade.

short_text: Introducing new CrunchPops, a range of great-tasting, roasted chickpeas loaded up with the Doritos flavors you love for a bold feel-good snack that'll keep you crunching through your day.
full_text: We start with real chickpeas, roast them to crunchy golden perfection and then blast them with the incredible flavors of Dorito for a max flavor experience. Inherently good, with 5g of protein from chickpeas themselves. Fun to eat and supremely munchable, the perfect snack to add some pop to your day. Available in great-tasting Doritos flavors like: Nacho Cheese, Cool Ranch

short_text: Introducing new 18 count Classic Mix. All your favorite snacks in a portion-controlled individual packs, each with only 80 calories or less!
full_text:
Introducing new 18 count Classic Mix. All your favorite snacks in a portion-controlled individual packs, each with only 80 calories or less! 

With only 80 calories or less per snack, Frito-Lay Classic multi-pack is individually portioned so you can feel good about enjoying your delicious favorites whenever and wherever you want. Throw it in your bag, pack it in your lunch, bring it to the pool. No matter your destination, you can have your favorites with Frito-Lay Classic multi-pack. 

Available in these tasty varieties:

- Classic Mix
- Flavor Mix
- Family Fun Mix
- Doritos & Cheetos Mix

All other Frito-Lay multi-pack offerings are still available.

See nutrition information for Total Fat content.

short_text: Introducing Fritos Stripes, multi-flavored, colorful Fritos that deliver an exciting flavor combination.
full_text: Fritos Stripes are bigger and better in every way. Each Frito is multi-colored to show you each flavor infused into the chip. With every hearty, crunchy bite the stripes of different flavors meld together for a unique explosion of flavor. Available in flavors like: Chili Cheese, Chipotle & Lime, and Honey & BBQ

short_text: Introducing Doritos BiteCoin, crunchy pressed coin shaped chips with QR codes inside the bag to scan to access metaverse VR experiences.
full_text: Doritos BiteCoin contains one hundred Doritos coins supercharged with intense flavor that is out of this world. In each bag you’ll also find a special code to unlock immersive gaming events and community VR experiences. Available in flavors like: Epic Nacho Cheese, Sizzling Szechuan Sweet Chili, Flamin’ Hot.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Veggie Curls, inspired by curly fries these puffed snacks contain vegetables and have a light crunch.
full_text: Lay’s Veggie Curls are light, crunchy and ready-to-eat veggie snacks shaped into an irresistible mix of spirals and curves. Grab a handful to enjoy a light, bite with crave-able flavor. Available in flavors like: Roast Beet, Roast Tomato and Spinach & Pea.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Loaded Potato Chips, twice-cooked and double the crunch, these chips are packed with flavor and texture that satisfy your cravings and more.
full_text: Lay’s Loaded Potato Chips are comfort-food inspired and loaded with flavor in every bite. Each chip has savory ingredients like cheddar or bacon baked right in, with even more herbs, seasonings and cheese seasoned on top. Get more out of each crafted, engaging bite. Available in the following flavors: Classic: Bacon, Cheddar, Sour Cream and Chive, and Pizza: Tomato, Oregano & Mozzarella

short_text: Introducing new Cheetos Boosters, a range of boldly cheesy puffs with a boost of protein mischievously sneaked in for a delicious snack that’ll fuel whatever fun you may get up to.
full_text: These deliciously crunchy puffs are made with real cheese for maximum flavor, with a playful boost from 4g of protein and the goodness of chickpeas so you can always fuel the fun. Available in fun flavors like: Cheddar, Cheddar Jalapeno, Flamin’ Hot

short_text: Mouthwatering flavor from your favorite Mediterranean spread in a light and airy chip!
full_text:
Taste real ingredients, like chickpeas and rice, now in one never-fried complete snacking package. Enjoy the flavor of creamy hummus with a bright, herbal taste from rosemary and olive oil. 

Gluten Free, No Artificial Flavors or Colors, Non-GMO Project Verified

short_text: Introducing new Cheetos Paws 'N Tails, a fun-to-eat, deliciously cheesy snack with the goodness of chickpeas snuck inside.
full_text:
These supremely munchable mix of puffs are full of absolutely delicious extra cheesy flavor. Plus they playfully sneak in the goodness of chickpeas inside for some added fiber. Perfect for the lunchbox or an on the go snack your kids will love and you can feel good about.

Available in fun Cheetos flavors like

- Cheddar
- Cheddar Jalapeno
- Flamin’ Hot

Source of fiber.

short_text: Introducing Lay's Pop n' Sweet, a new range of popped, sweet & salty Lay's that make for the perfect deliciously irresistible treat.
full_text:
These Lay's popped potato snacks have the just-right, perfect combination of sweetly salty flavor dusted on top and popped right into every snack. Combined with a light yet crunchy popped texture for an irresistibly munchable snack that never weighs you down.

Available in delicious flavors like:

- Sea Salted Caramel
- Honey & Cheddar
- Salted Maple

Never Fried.

short_text: Introducing Fritos Glazed Corn Chips, our classic corn chip glazed to satisfy your sweet tooth in a delicious new way.
full_text: We take the Fritos that you know and love and add a delectable glaze that blends delicious flavors like honey and rich, creamy butter for an irresistibly salty-sweet crunch. It's a whole new way to enjoy Fritos - packed with a sweet flavor that will keep you coming back for more. Available in the following flavors: Original Glazed, Honey Butter, and Cinnamon Sugar

short_text: Introducing new Lay’s Taste Journeys, a range of delicious, globally-inspired snacks that journey beyond your typical potato chip by using real chickpea to deliver a truly authentic, exotic taste experience.
full_text: These irresistible chips are made with chickpeas to authentically capture the rich, flavorful tastes inspired by Mediterranean hummus, spiced curries and more. Oven-baked to crispy perfection for a mouth-watering snack that will take you and your guests on a true taste journey. Available in delicious globally-inspired flavors like: Roasted Garlic, Spiced Red Curry, Sun-dried Tomato & Smoked Paprika

short_text: Introducing Doritos Grooves, Doritos shaped for dipping, dunking and shoveling into your favorite dips and salsas.
full_text: Doritos Grooves are a sturdy 'V' shape, designed to help you dig deep into the dip of your choice and get more of what you love. Available in flavors like: Nacho Cheese, Cool Ranch, Chile Limón.

short_text: Introducing Lay’s Kettle Cooked Thins, deliciously extra-crunchy potato chips that are also uniquely light.
full_text: Lay’s Kettle Cooked Thins bring the satisfying hard-bite of Kettle Chips into a thin format for a delightfully unexpected multi-textural experience. Available in flavors like: Sea Salt & Vinegar, Honey Habanero and Sour Cream & Chive.

short_text: Introducing Doritos Deep, another dimension added to Doritos, designed to dip, dunk and scoop your favorite dips and salsas.
full_text: Take it up another notch! Doritos Deep adds a fourth side to the classic triangle, to make them dippable. So go ahead, load up even more flavor in each unique bite to get more of what you love. Available in the following flavors: Nacho Cheese, Cool Ranch, and Flamin’ Hot

short_text: Introducing the 20 count Variety+ Snack Mix with Frito-Lay snacks and Skittles and Snickers. All your favorite snacks, in a convenient multi-pack!
full_text:

short_text: A line of artisan, bakery-inspired crackers that delivers a deliciously enjoyable experience that you can feel good about
full_text: Golden-baked, crispy whole grain crackers that deliver all the taste and enjoyment of your favorite sweet baked goods like pies, pastries and cakes.

short_text: A line of artisan, bread-inspired crackers that delivers a delicious bakery experience you can feel good about.
full_text: Golden-baked, crispy whole grain crackers with the familiar flavors of your favorite bakery breads like sourdough, ciabatta, soda bread and more.

short_text: Deliciously crunchy, wholesome cracker sandwiches that keep you full and fueled.
full_text: Mouthwateringly creamy dip-inspired fillings, like roasted red pepper, sandwiched between two whole grain crackers for a satisfying savory eat.

short_text: Graze away with the delicious taste of SunChips, now in super snackable mini crackers.
full_text: Round, thin miniature whole grain crackers in the shape of a sun and in classic SunChips flavors.

short_text: Snack on the bright side, with these tasty, sun-shaped whole grain crackers that help fuel your morning.
full_text: Bite-sized, bright and colorful crackers made with fiber-rich whole grains and veggies, then baked to thin & crispy perfection in a range of breakfast-inspired flavors like sweet potato hash.
